fields.name: St. Mary's Nyakhobi Senior School
fields.welcome_message: St. Mary's Nyakhobi Senior School (formerly Nyakhobi Secondary School) is a Sub-County public mixed day school located in Samia, Funyula, Busia County. We serve learners from the surrounding community with a focus on holistic education â€” academic, co-curricular, and life skills development.
fields.mission_statement: To provide quality, holistic education that develops academic excellence, discipline, character, and life skills in our students, preparing them to be responsible leaders and productive citizens in their communities and beyond.
fields.vision_statement: To be a leading educational institution in Busia County that builds leaders for tomorrow through academic excellence, community service, and character development.
fields.address: Off Nambuku/Funyula Rd, Funyula, P.O. Box 254, Funyula 50406, Busia County, Kenya

fields.title: Admissions
fields.description: Apply for Form 1 admission and learn about our KCPE requirements

fields.bio: Principal of St. Mary's Nyakhobi Senior School, committed to providing quality education and leadership development.
fields.qualifications: Bachelor of Education, Master of Education Leadership

fields.title: School Name Change Announcement
fields.content: We are excited to announce that Nyakhobi Secondary School is transitioning to St. Mary's Nyakhobi Senior School. This change reflects our commitment to academic excellence and our Catholic values while maintaining our strong community roots in Funyula.
fields.summary: Official announcement of school name change from Nyakhobi Secondary School to St. Mary's Nyakhobi Senior School.

fields.title: NACADA Life Skills Sensitization Program
fields.content: Our school recently hosted a successful NACADA life skills sensitization session for students. The program focused on drug abuse prevention, peer pressure management, and making healthy life choices.
fields.summary: NACADA conducts life skills training for students on drug abuse prevention and healthy lifestyle choices.

fields.title: Form 1 Registration 2025
fields.description: Registration for new Form 1 students for the year 2025. Parents and guardians should bring KCPE results, birth certificates, and other required documents.

fields.title: Inter-House Sports Competition
fields.description: Annual inter-house sports competition featuring athletics, football, volleyball, and other sporting activities. All students are encouraged to participate.
